name: plugin-name
description: This is a short description of what the plugin does.
author: SAU/CAL

scripts.sass: npm run sass:unminified && npm run sass:minified
scripts.js: npm run js:unminified && npm run js:minified
scripts.js:unminified: for f in $npm_package_assets_js_src**/*.js; do relative=$(realpath --relative-to="$npm_package_assets_js_src" "$f"); file=${f%.js}; mkdir -p "${npm_package_assets_js_out}$(dirname $relative)"; cp -f "$f" "${npm_package_assets_js_out}${relative}"; done
scripts.js:minified: for f in $npm_package_assets_js_out**/*.js; do relative=$(realpath --relative-to="$npm_package_assets_js_out" "$f"); file="${npm_package_assets_js_out}${relative}"; file="${file%.js}"; uglifyjs $f -c -m --output $file.min.js; done
scripts.translate: wpi18n makepot --domain-path "${npm_package_assets_pot}" --pot-file plugin-name.pot --type plugin --main-file plugin-name.php --exclude node_modules,tests,docs,docker
